name: Atmos
description: Atmos is a collection of custom nodes by Sol Amour - mostly focused upon Geometry | After installation searching for 'Atmos' will bring up the category in Dynamo | The nodes have been created and tested in Dynamo 1.3.0 and Revit 2017 | @solamour | www.cargocollective.com/amoursol
contents: Atmos.SlattedFacade.SlatGenerator - This node will generate a randomised series of 'Slats' based on the following criteria: Slat Thickness, Offset Distance (Total depth), total Slat Amount and a Tool Amount. , Atmos.SlattedFacade.SurfaceDistrubtion - This node will take an input surface and replicate said surface across a Surface Distribution Grid., Atmos.XY.frameExtents - Gathers the maximum and minimum points from a selection of model lines to create an extent frame. Output gives you the frame rectangle, corner points, centre points of frame and centroid of shape. , Atmos.XY.pointsDistribution - Creates a points distribution based off divisions across the XY Plane from a selection of Revit Model lines
